segments.text: I notice the woman standing there, towel in hand, focused on the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink behind her is overflowing wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling out in a sheet, hitting the floor hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got no idea, her expression so calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle's growing fast—someone's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, a boy's on a stool reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting back; it's not stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling cookies from the jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A plate in his other hand—maybe to hold them?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is watching, arm up like she's next in line.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet seeing them share the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the risks make me worry so much.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a lovely garden, all tidy and green.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside feels so tense compared to that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens to those kids.
segments.speaker: PAR
